Key Match Events: India restricted Zimbabwe to 115 for nine
Zimbabwe reduced India to 28 for four in the Powerplay
India was bowled out for 102 in 19.5 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe will look to exploit the home conditions against India, says Masakadza
Masakadza said they are trying to use their own conditions as much as they can against this Indian side
India is a second-string side, but there are a lot of good players in there
Post-Match Reflections: Masakadza said a series win will be a shot in the arm for Zimbabwe cricket
Masakadza added that a series win will be a very big thing in their future
Raza said winning the series will be a big thing for Zimbabwe and they'll be looking forward to making a few plans to get themselves across the line
Miscellaneous Highlights: The home team pacers will likely trouble the Indian batters due to their familiarity with the pitch
The ball will move a bit and it will spin also in Harare during winter
Raza wants to play in the IPL and is looking to take some wickets in this series to get a gig (IPL contract)
